summary.description: computationally inferring a gene regulatory network for Mycobacterium abscessus | BINDER (BayesIan gene regulatory Networks inferreD via gene coExpression and compaRative genomics) is a hybrid approach, integrating coexpression and comparative genomics to infer prokaryotic regulons | Code, data and results for 'BINDER: computationally inferring a gene regulatory network for Mycobacterium abscessus'
summary.name: BINDER
